data.description: Mobile Application Development Internship Calling all emerging technologists! Interested in real-world experience in mobile app development? Citizens is dedicated to opening doors for students and encouraging new ideas that drive impact. Join the 10week summer internship program and contribute to mobile app development efforts that power the college planning platform in our Student Lending ecosystem. Experience during the program Interns can expect to spend their time collaborating with other interns, colleagues, and business partners to work on a real-world project. The intern will play a key role in developing new features and enhancements for the Citizens digital platform, with a focus on integrating innovative college planning tools that support students in making informed financial and academic decisions. The role offers hands-on experience with modern web technologies, agile development practices, and cross-functional collaboration with product managers, desi...
